title: my joytokey settings

embed.description: Download the latest version of JoyToKey for free! JoyToKey enables PC game controllers to emulate a mouse and the keyboard input, so that windows applications and web games can be controlled with joysticks.

body:
i started to play lol a few days ago and found out i could use my xbox 360 controller to play it using the joytokey sw. so i found out the settings were stored in the cfg file so i will copy and paste my settings here for other people who want to see other peoples cfg file. its posted below, starting with the word general, just copy and paste it into your cfg file to use it.
___________________________

[General]
FileVersion=57
NumberOfJoysticks=2
Use8Axes=1
UseDiagonalInput=0
UsePOV=1
Threshold=260
KeySendMode=0
NumberOfButtons=32
DisplayMode=3
UsePOV8Way=0
Threshold2=150
SoundFile=
ImageFile=

[Joystick 1]
Axis1n=2,  -30,   0,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis1p=2,   30,   0,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis2n=2,    0, -30,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis2p=2,    0,  30,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Button01=1, 201:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button02=1, 203:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button04=1, 57:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button07=1, 11:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button08=1, 54:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button10=1, 09:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
POV1-5=1, 33:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
POV1-7=1, 35:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Axis5p=1, 52:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Axis4n=2,    0,  -3,   0, 0, 1, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis4p=2,    0,   3,   0, 0, 1, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Button11=1, 44:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button12=1, 46:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button05=1, 42:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button06=1, 32:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button03=1, 51:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0

[Joystick 2]

replies.body: League doesn't support controller settings, so we wouldn't be able to offer help for this or know how.  You might run into a lot of issues, so be super careful!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RwiUeuw4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-01T15:25:16.826+0000)
>
> League doesn't support controller settings, so we wouldn't be able to offer help for this or know how.  You might run into a lot of issues, so be super careful!

i have weak wrists from playing too much csgo and need to conserve my mouse clicking to try to heal my index finger so i made the controller to the l/r click on the buttons the thumb could press.

i googled some settings to use and got some but they didnt work so good so after trying to get the right feel i did and thought i should share.

i tried to use the setting with the ps4 controller and saw it didnt work using the xbox 360 controller settings in joytokey. 

so i made two new cfg files, 1 for the logitech rumblepad 2, 1 for the ps4 controller, and i cleaned up the xbox 360 cfg file settings. 

to use the ps4 controller you need to watch this video for a tutorial;

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=snjuJAgKib8

it uses the sw 
http://ds4windows.com/

extract the zip, run the "windows" file, install the driver, install the xbox 360 drivers if you use windows 7. connect the ps4 controller to the pc usb port, open the windows fie again, close it, then reopen it. then close the program and open the joytokey program.
when you reboot you dont need to open the ds4 program again. just the joytokey program.

i will separate the cfg file settings below using a line, the first cfg file settings will be for the xbox 360 controller, the second cfg file settings is for the rumblepad 2 controller, the third cfg settings is for the ps4 controller. just copy and paste the settings into the cfg file using notepad. each setting goes in its own cfg file.

____________________

[General]
FileVersion=57
NumberOfJoysticks=2
Use8Axes=1
UseDiagonalInput=0
UsePOV=1
Threshold=260
KeySendMode=0
NumberOfButtons=32
DisplayMode=2
UsePOV8Way=0
Threshold2=150
SoundFile=
ImageFile=

[Joystick 1]
Axis1n=2,  -30,   0,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis1p=2,   30,   0,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis2n=2,    0, -30,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Axis2p=2,    0,  30,   0, 0, 0, 0, 0.000, 0, 95, 1.0, 100, 0, 0, 0,    0
Button01=1, 201:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button02=1, 203:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button04=1, 57:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button11=1, 44:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button12=1, 46:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button05=1, 42:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button06=1, 32:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0
Button03=1, 51:00:00:00, 0.000, 0, 0

[Joystick 2]
